hi , i have windows vista so there is no "documents and settings " so where do i put the extras ? thnkooo :)

i have a windows 7 and i had a hard time finding the downloads and saved files but here they are:
Downloads:
C:\ProgramData\Microsoft Games\Zoo Tycoon 2\downloads\zootycoon_com_zt2_1033

Saved:
C:\Users\"user"\AppData\Roaming\Microsoft Games\Zoo Tycoon 2\"profile name"\Saved

you sholud copy the extras to these folders instead of "c;documents and settings/..."

and for a step by step on how to put the extras check this link: http://forums.zootycoon.com/forums/thread/5055.aspx

hope this helps
